name: Math Runner
description:
Simple game that tests your math computing ability. You will be shown a grid and imagine you are on the first cell (top left) and your princess is in the last cell (bottom right). Your aim is to get there with as fewer steps as possible.

Endless game with multiple difficulty modes. 

*In game instructions*

This is my first game so please give it a try and let me know what you think. Any feedback is much appreciated! Thanks
